Burning Hammer: Huh? Stay out of my fight slave!!

Perplex doesn't like Burning Hammer talking to Windlord that and swings at
Burning Hammer's head. Burning Hammer ducks, pounds his fist into Perplex's
ribs and pushes him over.

Burning Hammer: Tell me where your kid is or I will detonate you.

Perplex: Detonate?

Burning Hammer: I'll cook you from the inside out, that's what! But first I
want the kid!

Perplex: Wait, what did that mean? Detonate?

Burning Hammer: Pertress explodes, that's what. You will be dead. But to
make sure you don't survive for some reason, it can also release a virus
that will attack the spark. Slow painful death, I'm sure. The kid,
please?...

To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
